knimeNode.name: Time Difference
knimeNode.shortDescription: Appends the difference between two dates.

fullDescription.intro: Appends the difference between two dates with the selected aggregation level (year, quarter, month, week, day, hour, minute) and a selected precision for rounding.
fullDescription.option: Select the column containing the start date
Select the column containing the end date
The granularity of the difference (in years, quarters, months, weeks, days, hours, minutes)
Name of the newly appended column containing the time difference

ports.inPort: In data with at least two date columns
ports.outPort: Out data with the time difference appended
